urls.title: Two pilots discover they are sisters after years of crossing paths
urls.description: For years, two women, both pilots, have crossed paths but never knew they were actually sisters. NBC News’ Gadi Schwartz shares Shari Ritchkin and Tammy Holloway’s story of discovering their sisterhood.

data.text:
Captain Shari always felt destined to fly & learned it was in her DNA!

Recently, she met her biological sister, Tammy. The two have more than the same genes, Tammy also works in aviation.👩‍✈️✈️

 Check out their story on @NBCNews! 
https://t.co/t35TLPrxxF
